scripts.text: update t_nsa_gi_act set status='P' where status='A'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select MANDT,GR_CHARG,rtrim(GR_AIM_MATL_NO) as GR_MATNR_AIM,ID_MESSAGE as TIMESTAMP,PLANT,DOCU_DATE as BLDAT,POSTG_DATE as BUDAT,WRK_CENT as ARBPL,TOT_QTY as QUANTITY,isnull(QUANTITY_D,' ') as QUANTITY_D,isnull(OPR_ACTV_NO,' ') as VORNR,ORD_NO as AUFNR,
	isnull(ACTV_NO1,' ') as ACTIVITY1,isnull(ACTV_QTY1,' ') as ACT_QTY1,isnull(ACTV_UOM1,' ') as ACT_UOM1,
	isnull(ACTV_NO2,' ') as ACTIVITY2,isnull(ACTV_QTY2,' ') as ACT_QTY2,isnull(ACTV_UOM2,' ') as ACT_UOM2,
	isnull(ACTV_NO3,' ') as ACTIVITY3,isnull(ACTV_QTY3,' ') as ACT_QTY3,isnull(ACTV_UOM3,' ') as ACT_UOM3,
	isnull(ACTV_NO4,' ') as ACTIVITY4,isnull(ACTV_QTY4,' ') as ACT_QTY4,isnull(ACTV_UOM4,' ') as ACT_UOM4,
	isnull(ACTV_NO5,' ') as ACTIVITY5,isnull(ACTV_QTY5,' ') as ACT_QTY5,isnull(ACTV_UOM5,' ') as ACT_UOM5,
	isnull(ACTV_NO6,' ') as ACTIVITY6,isnull(ACTV_QTY6,' ') as ACT_QTY6,isnull(ACTV_UOM6,' ') as ACT_UOM6,
	isnull(SD_DOCU_NO,' ') as VBELN,isnull(ITEM_NO,'000000') as POSNR,PCODE,SHIFT,
	isnull(CFRM_NO_OP,'0000000000') as RUECK,isnull(CFRM_CNTR,'00000000') as RMZHL,isnull(CFRM_NO_REVOP,'0000000000') as REV_RUECK,isnull(CFRM_REVCNTR,'00000000') as REV_RMZHL,
	INTERFACE_ID as INTER_ID,isnull(REV_STATUS,' ') as REV_STATUS,REC_TYPE,'A' as STATUS,isnull(ERROR_CD,' ') as ERROR_CD,' ' as PROC_TS, 
	'00000000' as UDATE,'000000' as UTIME,' ' as USERID from t_nsa_gi_act 
	where status='P'

scripts.text:
insert into [dbo].[T_NSA_GR_STAGING] 
  SELECT [MANDT] as MANDT
     ,[CHARG] as CHARG
     ,rtrim([AIM_MATL_NO]) as MATNR_AIM
     ,[ID_MESSAGE] as TIMESTAMP
     ,rtrim([ACH_MATL_NO]) as MATNR_ACH
     ,[TOT_QTY] as QUANTITY
     ,rtrim([BASE_UOM]) as MEINS
     ,' ' as AUART
     ,[ORD_NO] as AUFNR
     ,[DOCU_DATE] as BLDAT
     ,[POSTG_DATE] as BUDAT
     ,[PCODE] as PCODE
     ,[PLANT] as PLANT
     ,[STOR_LOC] as LGORT
     ,'    ' as NO_OF_GI_REC
     ,'          ' as VBELN
     ,' ' as POSNR
     ,'          ' as MBLNR
     ,' ' as MJAHR
     ,' ' as RUECK
     ,' ' as RMZHL
     ,' ' as REV_RUECK
     ,' ' as REV_RMZHL
     ,isnull([ZBC_HEAT_NO],' ') as Z_HEAT_NO
     ,isnull([ZBC_THEO_WT],0.000) as Z_THEO_WT
     ,isnull([ZBC_SHIFT],' ') as Z_SHIFT
     ,[PROD_DATE] as Z_PROD_DATE
     ,rtrim([ZBC_MILL_SOURCE]) as Z_MILL_SOURCE
     ,isnull([ZBC_LENGTH],' ') as Z_LENGTH
     ,isnull(rtrim([ZBC_STANDARD]),' ') as Z_STANDARD
     ,' ' as Z_BAT_LOCATOR_A
     ,' ' as Z_BAT_LOCATOR_B
     ,' ' as Z_BAT_LOCATOR_C
     ,isnull([ZBC_PCS_PER_HEAT],' ') as Z_PCS_PER_HEAT
     ,isnull([ZBC_WT_PER_BLD],0.000) as Z_KG_PER_BLD
     ,isnull([ZBC_PCS_PER_BLD],' ') as Z_PCS_PER_BLD
     ,isnull([ZBC_WT_PER_PCS],0.000) as Z_KG_PER_PCS
     ,isnull([ZBC_WT_PER_COIL],0.000) as Z_KG_PER_COIL
     ,isnull([ZBC_ACT_COI_WT],0.000) as Z_ACT_COI_WT
     ,'        ' as Z_MAC_NO
     ,'        ' as Z_COIL_NO
     ,' ' as Z_TOTAL_CUT
     ,' ' as Z_TOTAL_BEND
     ,' ' as Z_TOTAL_LINK
     ,isnull([CUT_PER_TON],0.00) as Z_CUT_PER_TON
     ,isnull([BEND_PER_TON],0.00) as Z_BEND_PER_TON
     ,isnull([LINK_PER_TON],0.00) as Z_LINK_PER_TON
     ,'        ' as Z_COU_GRA
     ,'        ' as Z_COU_REF
     ,' ' as Z_NO_OF_END
     ,0.00 as Z_COU_DIA_1
     ,0.00 as Z_COU_DIA_2
     ,' ' as Z_COU_TYPE_1
     ,' ' as Z_COU_TYPE_2
     ,' ' as Z_NO_OF_PNT
     ,' ' as Z_TAG_NO
     ,' ' as Z_MAC_TPL
     ,' ' as Z_NO_OF_STR
     ,0.000 as Z_AREA_PER_PC
     ,isnull([ZBC_WT_PER_PCS],0.000) as Z_WT_PER_PC
     ,isnull([CON_MAT],' ') as Z_CON_MAT
     ,isnull([CONSUME_BATCHES],' ') as Z_CONSUME_BATCHE
     ,' ' as Z_SHAPE_CODE
     ,' ' as Z_INV_LEN
     ,' ' as Z_WBS1
     ,' ' as Z_WBS2
     ,' ' as Z_WBS3
     ,' ' as Z_BBSNO
     ,' ' as Z_PROD_MARK
     ,0.00 as Z_MW_SPA
     ,0.00 as Z_CW_SPA
     ,' ' as Z_MW_LEN
     ,' ' as Z_CW_LEN
     ,' ' as Z_PIECES
     ,'0' as Z_CW_OVR_HANG1
     ,'0' as Z_CW_OVR_HANG2
     ,'0' as Z_MW_OVR_HANG1
     ,'0' as Z_MW_OVR_HANG2
     ,' ' as Z_BBS_DESC
     ,isnull([PLANT_D],' ') as PLANT_D
     ,isnull([STOR_LOC_D],' ') as LGORT_D
     ,isnull([MATL_NO_D],' ') as MATNR_D
     ,isnull([QUANTITY_D],0.000) as QUANTITY_D
     ,isnull([CHARG_D],' ') as CHARG_D
     ,[SHIFT] as SHIFT
     ,' ' as REV_STATUS
     ,' ' as PROD_STATUS
     ,'A' as STATUS
     ,' ' as ERROR_CD
     ,[REC_TYPE] as REC_TYPE
     ,' ' as PROC_TS
     ,[INTERFACE_ID] as INTER_ID
     ,'00000000' as UDATE
     ,'000000' as UTIME
     ,'BGDJOBS' as USERID
     ,' ' as NDS_SALE_ORDER
     ,' ' as ORDER_ITEM
     FROM [dbo].[T_NSA_GR] where status='T'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  MANDT, CHARG, MATNR_AIM, TIMESTAMP, MATNR_ACH, QUANTITY, MEINS, AUART, AUFNR, BLDAT, BUDAT, PCODE, PLANT, LGORT, NO_OF_GI_REC, VBELN, POSNR, MBLNR, MJAHR, RUECK , RMZHL, REV_RUECK, REV_RMZHL, Z_HEAT_NO, Z_THEO_WT, Z_SHIFT, Z_PROD_DATE, Z_MILL_SOURCE, Z_LENGTH, Z_STANDARD
     , Z_BAT_LOCATOR_A
     , Z_BAT_LOCATOR_B
     , Z_BAT_LOCATOR_C
     , Z_PCS_PER_HEAT
     , Z_KG_PER_BLD
     , Z_PCS_PER_BLD
     , Z_KG_PER_PCS
     , Z_KG_PER_COIL
     , Z_ACT_COI_WT
     , Z_MAC_NO
     , Z_COIL_NO
     , Z_TOTAL_CUT
     , Z_TOTAL_BEND
     , Z_TOTAL_LINK
     , Z_CUT_PER_TON
     , Z_BEND_PER_TON
     , Z_LINK_PER_TON
     , Z_COU_GRA
     , Z_COU_REF
     , Z_NO_OF_END
     , Z_COU_DIA_1
     , Z_COU_DIA_2
     , Z_COU_TYPE_1
     , Z_COU_TYPE_2
     , Z_NO_OF_PNT
     , Z_TAG_NO
     , Z_MAC_TPL
     , Z_NO_OF_STR
     , Z_AREA_PER_PC
     , Z_WT_PER_PC
     , Z_CON_MAT
     , Z_CONSUME_BATCHE
     , Z_SHAPE_CODE
     , Z_INV_LEN
     , Z_WBS1
     , Z_WBS2
     , Z_WBS3
     , Z_BBSNO
     , Z_PROD_MARK
     , Z_MW_SPA
     , Z_CW_SPA
     , Z_MW_LEN
     , Z_CW_LEN
     , Z_PIECES
     , Z_CW_OVR_HANG1
     , Z_CW_OVR_HANG2
     , Z_MW_OVR_HANG1
     , Z_MW_OVR_HANG2
     , Z_BBS_DESC
     , PLANT_D
     , LGORT_D
     ,MATNR_D
     , QUANTITY_D
     , CHARG_D
     , SHIFT
     , REV_STATUS
     ,PROD_STATUS
     , STATUS
     , ERROR_CD
     , REC_TYPE
     , PROC_TS
     , INTER_ID
     , UDATE
     , UTIME
     , USERID
     , NDS_SALE_ORDER
     , ORDER_ITEM
     FROM [dbo].[T_NSA_GR_STAGING]

scripts.text:
SELECT LOT_NO FROM SAP_RESULTS_HDR a left join (select distinct charg,ach_matl_no,status from t_nsa_gr) b 
  on a.charg=b.charg where a.status='A' and b.status in('P','Y','E')

SELECT LOT_NO FROM SAP_RESULTS_HDR a left join (select distinct fld_GR_batch_id,fld_gr_aim_matl_no from [NSDB11STS].[STS].dbo.tbl_sts_dns_GR where fld_gr_aim_matl_no like 'FP%') b 
 on a.charg=b.fld_GR_batch_id and a.MATL_NO=b.fld_gr_aim_matl_no 
 where a.status='A' and a.MATL_NO like 'FP%'

DECLARE @lcReProcessDate AS VARCHAR(MAX)
SELECT LOT_NO FROM SAP_RESULTS_HDR WHERE 
  CONVERT(VARCHAR(25), ID_MESSAGE, 126) LIKE @lcReProcessDate and status='E'

DECLARE @lcLotNo AS VARCHAR(MAX) 
insert into T_DTL_T 
				select MANDT,LOT_NO,rtrim(MAST_INSP_CHRSTICS) as MAST_INSP_CHRSTICS,rtrim(SAMPLE_NO) as SAMPLE,TEST_RESULT_VAL,USER_ID,rtrim(TEST_DATE) as TEST_DATE,rtrim(TEST_TIME) as TEST_TIME,'A' as STATUS,INTERFACE_ID as INTER_ID,ID_MESSAGE as TIMESTAMP,' ' as ERROR_CD,' ' as PROC_TS,' ' as REC_TYPE,' ' as USERID,'00000000' as UDATE,'000000' as UTIME 
				from SAP_RESULTS_DTL where LOT_NO=@lcLotNo;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select MANDT,
    LOT_NO,
    MATL_NO,
    BATCH_NO,
    STOR_LOC,
    PLANT,
    TOT_ELEM,
    INSP_LOT_NO,
    USER_ID,
    TEST_DATE,
    TEST_TIME,
    STATUS,
    INTER_ID,
    TIMESTAMP,
    ERROR_CD,
    PROC_TS,
    REC_TYPE,
    USERID,
    UDATE,
    UTIME
	FROM [dbo].[T_HDR_T]
